comment: Wrong listings, wrong times, existing bus stops don't appear to exist on the app, stops that haven't existed in years, however, do. How old are the maps you are using? Completely useless. Can't exit the app via back button either. Poorly coded, long outdated tosh. Unsurprising, seeing how the latest update was like three years ago. This app should be pulled from the store.
Poor GUI. can't determine where bus is.  Use BusLink instead (also stupid spelling but works)
title: Stupid spelling of name and more

comment: It is helpful.  I love it.

author: Jolene Chaisson
comment: Live it

author: Sergey Kovynev
comment: But the main functionality missing - you can't close it. It sits open until you go to task manager and force close it.
title: Nice app. Timetable times are accurate.

author: Justin Ma
comment: Handy tool to have if you're dependent on the transit system here like me. Check it out.
title: Best transit tool

author: Baxa KK
comment: Edit. I liked older version, could use offline. Now everything is messed up, I know it can be used offline but it doesn't open routes like before. Also it looks obvious that it targets people who use connection. Uninstalling.

reply.author: Kinetiqa Labs
reply.content:
Hi Baxa,

You should definitely still be able to use this app offline! When you don't have a network connection, the app will use it's onboard database to find offline stop times. Additionally, you can choose to use this app in offline mode only by going to the "..." tab and "Settings"

title: Became useless for me

author: John Dong
comment: It doesn't have night bus schedule, everything is perfect except for that

author: Jerry Tu
comment: It is very useful.
title: Great!

author: A Google User
comment: Decent interface. Would've liked to be able to search both nextbus and routes from the same box like on the translink site. Does not show Community bus routes (e.g. C3), under route search. Also, clicking back doesn't exit the app properly nor is there an exit button.
title: Not bad

author: Evan Taylor
comment: This app is amazing, saves me time almost every day. However I frequently need to see when the 106 new west/metro town bus runs and all the info and stops are wrong. Just hoping it could be fixed.
title: 106 bus route fix?

author: A Google User
comment: It has all the schedules and routes (including stops) of every transit, including bus, WCE, Skytrain and Seabus. Plus you get to save all your favorite stops and routes. Awesome!
title: Best Translink App

author: Gennifer Miller
comment: I checked the C70 (and double checked it with Translink) and that schedule still shows a half hourly service on Saturday, even though that was discontinued in September 2012. It's now April 2013
title: Not updating schedules

author: A Google User
comment: Very good app. I think it has a big thow..after you open the app it stays in memory and can't close it .
title: Excellent

author: Kate Yray
comment: This app is so useful and handy. I always know if I'm at the right stop at the right time. Good job for the developers. :))
title: The best. :)

author: A Google User
comment: its an amazing fast app to use look out  the bus schedule,shure I'll give five stars,superb.

author: wenny tsai
comment: The time is around 2 to 5 minutes behind translink published timetable !
title: Please Update the time table

author: A Google User
comment: Where is schedule for skytrain or other transports?
title: Just bus!?

author: A Google User
comment: It contains the schedules and the information of each stop, in an easy-to-use manner
title: Fast and easy to use

author: A Google User
comment: Awesome application !!!
title: Excellent app !!

author: Robb Davis
comment: Great app

author: A Google User
comment: This is great, it has an offline schedule. You can search using street name, bus stop number and bus numbers without using any mobile data. Overall very useful.
title: First Offline Schedule App

author: A Google User
comment: Best transit app out there - every transit user should have this! Favorites make it super fast to find next buses and the offline access is a plus.
title: Awesome!

author: Matthew Okert
comment: I love this app, so easy to use and has all the stops and times. Also the times it gives you are not 100% accurate, they are usually 3-5 mins early which is actually useful.
title: Awesome!

comment: A nice app -- lots of useful info. But unfortunately, it's a memory hog, and I have only 1GB available in my Nexus S. I found I had to lighten the load, and the other transit apps I have (TransitDB and LiveTransit) provided much the same info but with much less impact on primary memory.
title: Kinda large...

author: First Last
comment: CANNOT QUIT, EXIT, CLOSE!! - - - - - - Surely the concept of a means to stop, end, close, exit, or quit is not too difficult? - - - - -  Otherwise it would be a good and very useful app.
title: CANNOT QUIT, EXIT, CLOSE

author: A Google User
comment: Easy to use but bus schedule is not right. Very disappointed
title: Inaccurate bus schedule

author: A Google User
comment: I gave it 5 stars for the following reasons, simple, easy, efficient, accurate, FREE, nd u can use it while ur offline ! Keep up the gd work dev
title: Deserves it

author: A Google User
comment: Gives pretty accurate bus times, but the location finder is NOT accurate.
title: Fast, gives the right bus times

author: A Google User
comment: Handy
title: Samsung galaxy note

author: A Google User
comment: Too much space
